title: Bring It On!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Everyone, today is the day of our live! Let’s do our best~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Let’s mesmerize everyone that came to see us with our special world!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu, and let’s show them the results of our practice. Aaah~, I can’t wait for it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You don’t seem nervous at all today, Ayumu-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah! Maybe I’m getting overconfident because the three of us are together. I’m quite simple, after all. Ahaha.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Me too. I also think that we should push ourselves farther than usual.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufu, actually, me too. Whatever happens, even if something did happen, we just need to make it fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Now that you say that, I’m even more excited about what will happen. Let’s enjoy it to the fullest!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
